title: Balochistan Ulema delegation meets president
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 27 (APP): A delegation of Ulema from Balochistan Sunday called on President Dr Arif Alvi here at Aiwan-e-Sadr to play their part in resolving key social issues.
Deputy Speaker National Assembly, Qasim Khan Suri led the delegation, according to president house.
The president’s meeting with Ulema is the continuation of his interaction with them to enhance the pulpit’s role on different social issues like women rights, promotion
of breastfeeding and prevention of diseases through cleanliness, besides others.
